item.title: Predicting Boston Property Price
item.description: Introduction Predict Boston property price by analyzing data scraped from trulia.com using advanced regression models. I will go in-depth for all the processes of this project: from using Beautiful Soup to scrape data, to analyze and compare different regression models, and building an Application Programming Interface (API) using a micro web framework in Python: Flask. For in-depth step-by-step code analysis, the repository for this project can be found here. My goal for this project is to use the best regression model to predict Boston housing prices on Trulia based on the number of features that the source provides.
